register.title: What's your email?
register.paragraph: We need to send you information related to your refund.
register.rrssLabel: Or sign in with your social networks

login.title: What´s your email?
login.paragraph: Enter the email used to create your account
login.emailAccountError: We couldn´t find this email address

loginPassword.title: Enter your password
loginPassword.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: This email address is already in use.
loginPassword.auth/email-already-in-use: This email address is already in use.
loginPassword.auth/invalid-email: The email address is not valid.
loginPassword.auth/weak-password: The password is not strong enough.
loginPassword.auth/invalid-credential: Email/password are incorrect or have expired.

registerPassword.title: Choose a password.
registerPassword.paragraph: We need it to send you information related to your refund.
registerPassword.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: This email address is already in use.
registerPassword.auth/user-disabled: The account associated to the corresponding credential has been disabled.

emailConfirmation.title: Verify your email
emailConfirmation.paragraph: Please follow the instructions we have sent to you

scanPassportPermission.title: Scan your passport
scanPassportPermission.paragraph: In order to refund your taxes we require your passport. Please capture the image of the page with your photograph.

scanPassport.title: Looking good?
scanPassport.paragraph: Please check both pages are complete and with legible information
scanPassport.errorSavingText: An error occured whilst saving your passport, please try again later.

selfiePermission.title: Take a selfie
selfiePermission.paragraph: We need a photo of your face to verify your identity

selfie.title: How do you look?
selfie.paragraph: Make sure we can recognise you

invoiceAddress.title: Billing address
invoiceAddress.paragraph: This information will help you when requesting a bill
invoiceAddress.errorSavingTitle: An error occured whilst saving your address
invoiceAddress.errorSavingText: Sorry, an error occured whilst saving your address, please try again later.

startTrip.title: We require information relating to your trip
startTrip.departureType.title: How are you travelling?

home.title: My trip to Spain
home.titleIsSchengen: Non-Schengen countries coming soon. We will notify you know as soon as we launch in more countries

homeAlerts.passport: There are two invoices which require your attention

scanInvoice.title: Looking good?
scanInvoice.paragraph: Please ensure that all information displayed on the invoice is legible

walkThroughSwiper.title: Easy
walkThroughSwiper.paragraph: Recover the taxes from your shopping easily

notificationPermission.title: Turn notifications on
notificationPermission.paragraph: So you can keep track of any important events on your trip.

locationPermission.title: Share your location
locationPermission.paragraph: So we can share local information with you

alertsTab.title: Notifications
alertsTab.noAlert: Únete al wooniverso, nosotros de guiaremos.

closeTrip.alert.title: You are about to close your trip
closeTrip.alert.text: If you have finished making purcahses in Spain, we will guide you through the process of reimbursing your taxes.
closeTrip.step1.label: Summary
closeTrip.step1.title: Summary of your trip
closeTrip.step2.label: Customs
closeTrip.step2.title: Go to customs
closeTrip.step2.text: Prepare to display the codes from the invoices to the DIVA machine in the invoice stamping area.
closeTrip.step2.machine: What does the machine look like?
closeTrip.step2.machineModal: The DIVA validation machine looks like this
closeTrip.step2.code: How do I display the codes?
closeTrip.step2.codeModal: Put the codes in front of the sensor at waist height.
closeTrip.step3.label: Scan
closeTrip.step3.title: Scan the codes
closeTrip.success: Thank you for using Woonivers. We are validating your information with the tax agency

boardingScanPermission.boardingScanPermission.title: Boarding pass
boardingScanPermission.boardingScanPermission.paragraph: We require a photo of your boarding pass before we can reimburse your taxes. We cannot process your refund until we have verified this document.
boardingScanPermission.boardingScan.title: Looking good?
boardingScanPermission.boardingScan.paragraph: Please ensure that the two pages are visible, and that the text is legible.

noSchengen.noSchengen.paragraph: You are not leaving the Schengen area yet, so you should follow the steps below.
noSchengen.noSchengen.paragraphStep1: Print the email that we have sent which contains the details of your refund, and the instructions once you have arrived to your next destination
noSchengen.noSchengen.paragraphStep2: When you arrive to the airport to leave the Schengen zone, go to customs and ask to have the documents stamped to validate them.
noSchengen.noSchengen.paragraphStep3: Send proof of the validation which they provided in customs

invoices.badImage: There is a problem with your photo
invoices.badInvoice: There is a problem with your invoice
invoices.badSerial: There is an error with your serial number

invoiceDetail.imageScannedRecomendation.title: Please take the following reccommendations into account
invoiceDetail.imageScannedRecomendation.1: 1. The invoice must be flat, facing up
invoiceDetail.imageScannedRecomendation.2: 2. Place it on a flat surface
invoiceDetail.imageScannedRecomendation.3: 3. Ensure that there is plenty of light (and always use the flash)
invoiceDetail.imageScannedRecomendation.4: 4. Place the camera paralel to the invoice
invoiceDetail.ACTION_REQUIRED_SERIAL_NUMBER: Enter the serial number to validate your refund
invoiceDetail.itsArequirement: This is an important requirement from the tax office so we can process your refund
invoiceDetail.isCorrect: Please ensure that this is correct
invoiceDetail.rememberSaveOriginalInvoice: Remember to save your original invoice, you may need this at a later date
invoiceDetail.rejectedInvoice: Your invoice has been rejected by the DIVA system due to an issue relating to the invoice number that the retailer provided.

billingInfo.title: We require an invoice containing the following information
billingInfo.name: First name

changeRecoverPassword.changeParagraph: We will send instructions to change your password via email
changeRecoverPassword.recoverParagraph: Enter your email to regain access to your Woonivers account
changeRecoverPassword.postSend: We have sent you an email to reset your password. Please check your inbox.

savings.modalOkParagraph: You have successfully withdrawn the funds

modalNoToken.title: Your session has expired
modalNoToken.paragraph: For your security, the current session has expired. Return to login.
